recipe_name: Green beans with ginger and mustard
author: Manju Malhi
method: Heat the oil in a saucepan.  Add the mustard seeds. A few seconds later tip in the beans with the cumin and fry for 1 minute.   Stir in the ginger and salt and sauté over a low heat for 5 minutes.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ tsp mustard seeds ,  200g/7oz green beans, trimmed and par-boiled,  1 tsp cumin powder,  1 tsp peeled and grated root ginger,  ¼ tsp salt
